description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.",
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Reference Number: CB-374-88444116
#### Solicitation Number: W8482-241933/A
#### Amendment Number: 8

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of Transmitter, Temperature, Electrical Resistance items.

**Description of the Requirement**
The Department of National Defence requires the following items:

* Item 1: Transmitter, Temperature, Electrical Resistance (GSIN: 6685, NSN: 01-630-2750)
	+ Part No.: 1000-510-1013
	+ Manufacturer: WEED INSTRUMENT COMPANY INC. (NCAGE: 33969)
	+ Quantity: 12
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: Transmitter, Temperature, Electrical Resistance (GSIN: 6685, NSN: 01-630-2750)
	+ Part No.: 1000-510-1013
	+ Manufacturer: WEED INSTRUMENT COMPANY INC. (NCAGE: 33969)
	+ Quantity: 12
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Proposal Requirements**
Bidders proposing an Equivalent or Substituted Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and NCAGE they are offering.

**Pricing**
Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Preference**
There is a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

**Submission**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Notice Details**
* Publication Date: 2023-12-06
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-12
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-15
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-01-15
* Tender Status: Expired

**Contact Information**
For further information, please contact:
Katharine Barker
Email: [Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Katharine.Barker2@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (555) 555-5555
Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A 0K2

**Attachments**
* https://canadabuys.can
